description: New Trent Trent IMP39B/NT-39B Embassy Keyboard CaseIt is the 3rd Generation wireless Bluetooth keyboard hard case from New Trent, the upgraded version of New Trent best selling case IMP39B/NT-39B. This sleek and ultraportable wireless keyboard case will let you carry your ipad 2 device with a full protection where ever you go. When you travel, there's no need to carry additional keyboard for your ipad 2, the IMP39B/NT-39B is the ultimate all in one solution for your iPad 2!Product highlights- The high quality hard Case protects your Apple iPad 2. This Flip over case protects your iPad 2 in both during travel and when on display in Vertically or Horizontally position into 3 different comfortable viewable anglesThermoplastic full body protection, Leather Surface finish, elegant and finger Print Free , Wide Key Design (15.1 mm wide, 18% bigger than average keyboard), Designated editing keys (Select All, Copy, Paste, Cut)Specs- Fits iPad 2 only does not fit newer and 1st gen iPads- Thermoplastic case- Bluetooth keyboardNew Trent is the trademark of New Trent Inc. Exclusively marketed by authorized reseller idealpoint on amazon.com. Be sure to find the logo on both product and package to ensure 10 months product warranty
title: New Trent IMP39B/NT-39B Embassy Keyboard Case for iPad 2, Bluetooth keyboard /w leather finish back cover for Apple iPad 2 3G Tablet, WIFI Model, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB, with three different adjustable angles.
